# Group 4 Project for CPSC 441, Fall 2020


### System Setup
```{r}
install.packages('tidytuesdayR')
library(tidytuesdayR)
tt_datasets(2018)
tt_datasets(2019)
tt_datasets(2020)

NFL = tt_load('2018-04-09')
NFL_data = NFL$nfl_salary
tuition = tt_load(2018, 1)
tuition_data = tuition$us_avg_tuition

```
